vclaim: An April 2021 CIA promotional video showed a Latina agent describing herself as a “woman of color,” “mom,” “a cisgender millennial who has been diagnosed with generalized anxiety disorder,” who is also “intersectional.”
title: Did CIA Video Feature ‘Intersectional,’ ‘Cisgender,’ ‘Latina’ Woman?
subtitle: A promotional CIA video was decried as “woke recruitment” and “propaganda.”
author: Nur Ibrahim
